name: Fréquence 252.0
description:
Fréquence 252.0 is a short game on the theme of the transmission in 2d.

As the player, you have to send a importante message to your base, but you must avoid the ennemy drone and various obstacle.

This game is a student project make in one week, i hope you will enjoy it .

PC Controls

Right and left arrows - Move parable

Space bar - Launch 

Credits

Programming - Mathieu Way

Art and Design - Romain Vuarchex
